channel.title: Player get black screen at logon help!
channel.description:
Hey. I used to never have this problem before, but recently I've been getting a problem where if a new player joins the server, it will give them a black screen and they can't log out or play the game. This is what it shows.
[img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/1420/blackscreenglitch.png[/img]
When I try and do a command to possibly teleport away, or if I use any command, I get this in my server window:
[code][client-11-nubnubnub]: playerCommand: starter java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -3 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:11671) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23647) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18964) at client.packetSending(client.java:18917) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:53) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player nubnubnub ClientHandler: Client nubnubnub disconnected.[/code]
Can someone please help me? This is preventing new players to join my server......
EDIT: Now I just found out it doesn't black screen some people but it does for me and others. Also.. I can't use any commands. It disconnects me but some people can.

Couldn’t have said it better than myself.

item.title: Player get black screen at logon help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It’s completely asinine… The kind of help here is:

Guy who needs help: I need help fixing my ban command. Help is appreciated.
Guy who’s smartass: Change sources.
Guy with 10 rep: That’s stupid why should he change sources?
Guy with 11 rep: That’s not stupid, you’re stupid.
Guy with 10 rep: Shut up ass. You don’t know anything.
Guy with 11 rep: I’m smarter than you Mr. 10 Rep.
runefreak10: Stfu flamers. Guy who needs help, what exactly are your problems with your ban command?
Guy who’s smartass: He should just change sources.
Smart man with 200 rep & experienced who should have came in from the beginning before flame/spam occured: Rep don’t mean shit. So don’t speak. Proceeds on with helping guy who needs help.
Guy who’s Moderator: warns guy with 10 rep and guy with 11 rep then continues on to leave without attempting help

That’s pretty much how it plays out here.

Read full topic
item.source: Player get black screen at logon help!

item.title: Player get black screen at logon help!
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Yeah, that signature’s mad old. But like that’s how it is with me. Most of my posts are around 0-10 views with no replies.

item.source: Player get black screen at logon help!

item.title: Player get black screen at logon help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:4, topic:275538”][code][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=364000.msg2763735#msg2763735 date=1240688751]
I’ve fixed the problem with the commands. But it still black screens me at logon. If I log in, I have a black screen but if I type ::train or something to teleport to train, then it fixes the black screen once teleported. How can I just fix it though…
[/quote]

In the login process, add something along the longs of this:
code]if(absX == -1 && absY == -1) {
resetPos();
}[/code]

That’s what I did, along with a resetpos command.
Just add a method for the resetpos to set your x and y to your starting spot.[/quote]

Thanks, but I fixed my problem anyways. But I hate it how I make effort to help people on these forums and I get no replies to my help topics. So with that said, I back up your signature.

Read full topic
item.source: Player get black screen at logon help!

item.title: Player get black screen at logon help!
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

[code][quote=“runefreak10, post:3, topic:275538”]I’ve fixed the problem with the commands. But it still black screens me at logon. If I log in, I have a black screen but if I type ::train or something to teleport to train, then it fixes the black screen once teleported. How can I just fix it though…[/quote]

In the login process, add something along the longs of this:
code]if(absX == -1 && absY == -1) {
resetPos();
}[/code]

That’s what I did, along with a resetpos command.
Just add a method for the resetpos to set your x and y to your starting spot.

Read full topic
item.source: Player get black screen at logon help!
